summary.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

span.span: Provides a base class for database-specific classes that represent commands.

summary.span: Attempts to cancels the execution of a .

span.span: Attempts to cancels the execution of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si no hay que cancelar nada, no ocurre nada.If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. Sin embargo, si hay un comando en ejecución y el intento de cancelarlo no tiene éxito, no se genera ninguna excepción.However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Al establecer el a `StoredProcedure`, debe establecer el propiedad en el nombre del procedimiento almacenado.When you set the to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. El comando ejecuta este procedimiento almacenado cuando se llama a uno de los `Execute` métodos.The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un se genera si el asignado valor de propiedad es menor que 0.An is generated if the assigned property value is less than 0. Tenga en cuenta a los implementadores, se recomienda que 0 no significa tiempo de espera.Note to implementers, it is recommended that 0 means no timeout.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteNonQuery () As Integer

summary.span: Executes a SQL statement against a connection object.

span.span: Executes a SQL statement against a connection object.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede usar para realizar operaciones de catálogo (por ejemplo, consultar la estructura de una base de datos o crear objetos de base de datos como tablas), o para cambiar los datos en una base de datos ejecutando las instrucciones UPDATE, INSERT o DELETE.You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. Aunque no devolver ninguna fila, los parámetros de salida o devolver los valores asignados a los parámetros se rellenan con datos.Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. Para las instrucciones UPDATE, INSERT y DELETE, el valor devuelto es el número de filas afectadas por el comando.For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. Para los demás tipos de instrucciones, el valor devuelto es -1.For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: Executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

span.span: Executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: All other columns and rows are ignored.

span.span: All other columns and rows are ignored.

returns.span: The first column of the first row in the result set.

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use el método para recuperar un único valor (por ejemplo, un valor agregado) de una base de datos.Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. Esto requiere menos código que utiliza el método y realiza las operaciones necesarias para generar un único valor mediante los datos devueltos por una .This requires less code than using the method and performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by a . Si la primera columna de la primera fila del conjunto de resultados no se encuentra, una referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) se devuelve.If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned. Si el valor de la base de datos es `null`, la consulta devuelve `DBNull.Value`.If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el propiedad está establecida en `TableDirect`, `Prepare` no hace nada.If the property is set to `TableDirect`, `Prepare` does nothing. Si está establecido en `StoredProcedure`, la llamada a `Prepare` debería realizarse correctamente, aunque el resultado puede ser una operación inefectiva.If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to `Prepare` should succeed, although it may result in a no-op.
